insert into five_oa_invent_payment (business_key, dept_id, dept_Name, payment_time, remark, creator, creator_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_deleted, is_process_end, process_instance_id ) values (#{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{processEnd,jdbcType=BIT}, #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update five_oa_invent_payment set business_key = #{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dept_Name = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment_time = #{paymentTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_name = #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, is_process_end = #{processEnd,jdbcType=BIT}, process_instance_id = #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, business_key, dept_id, dept_Name, payment_time, remark, creator, creator_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_deleted, is_process_end, process_instance_id from five_oa_invent_payment where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, business_key, dept_id, dept_Name, payment_time, remark, creator, creator_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_deleted, is_process_end, process_instance_id from five_oa_invent_payment
order by id desc
